suiteDescription: Test cases collection for Searches Feature in Search Engine

testCases.testName: Verify Search Bar is working
testCases.testDescription: Enter Property Name in Search Bar and Click Search Button
testCases.testObjectives: Verify Search Bar and button functionality

testSteps.name: Verify Search Bar and Button Functionality

testCases.testName: Filter Button Click and Close

testSteps.name: Verify Search Bar and Button Functionality

testCases.testName: Filter Button-> Click on Show Button
testCases.testDescription: Check the functionality of Show Button in Filters
testCases.testObjectives: Verify functionality of Show Button in Filters

testCases.testName: Enter Min and Max Price For Sale
testCases.testDescription: Validate that user can enter Min and max price For Sale

testSteps.name: Enter Min Value 0 and max value 100000

testCases.testName: Enter Number of Rooms For Sale
testCases.testDescription: Validate that user can Select Number of Rooms 3

testCases.testName: Enter Number of Bathrooms For Sale
testCases.testDescription: Validate that user can Select Number of Rooms 2

testCases.testName: Select EPC Label A Sale
testCases.testDescription: Validate that user can Select EPC Label to A
